alert.note: Alert for Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 12:45PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central West Baton Rouge, south central Pointe Coupee and northwestern Iberville Parishes through 115 PM CDT... At 1244 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Atchafalaya National Wildlife Refuge, or 10 miles southeast of Krotz Springs, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Livonia, Maringouin, Fordoche, Rosedale, Grosse Tete, Ramah and Lottie. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 127 and 140. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding of low lying and poor drainage areas. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge
